name: Rick Rich Is The Glich Buster
name_original: Rick Rich Is The Glich Buster
description:
Rick Rich is the Glitch Buster is a 2D platform action game made in Weekly Game Jam on week 64: Glitch by a Brazilian group called: Achenar Studios, where Timmy, a normal person that tries to download pirate games and get a really bad virus that infected in his computer, he calls Rick, the best computer technician of his city to fix his computer, but suddently the virus drags Rick in to the computer. Now you need to control Rick and eliminate all viruses in the computer!

Artists:

  • Henry Rodrigues Kinoshita
  • Lord Erin
  • Paulo Henrique Lopes

Programmers:

  • Danilo Macedo Bakun
  • Gabriel Bigardi

Songs taked from:
https://soundimage.org/
